#### HL Assurance 24 HOUR EMERGENCY HELPLINE (65) 6922 6009

##### Motor Emergency Assistance Services
Please note that the Services under Items (a) to (h) are purely on referral or arrangement basis. All costs and expenses incurred for the services listed below are to be borne by You.
(a) 24 Hours Emergency Towing Assistance
(b) 24 Hours Minor Roadside Repair Assistance
(c) Claims Procedure / Reporting Assistance
(d) Workshop Referral after Accident Assistance
(e) Service Centre Referral Assistance in Malaysia
(f) Car Replacement / Arrangement of Rental Vehicle Assistance Service
(g) Arrangement of Hotel Accommodation Assistance
(h) Emergency Message Transmission Assistance
questions: How does the policy define the scope and cost responsibility for the 24 Hours Emergency Towing Assistance and Minor Roadside Repair Assistance under the Motor Emergency Assistance Services?
In what ways do the Claims Procedure / Reporting Assistance and Workshop Referral after Accident Assistance services support the insured, and who bears the expenses for these services?

What are the conditions and limitations for the Car Replacement or Arrangement of Rental Vehicle Assistance Service, and how does this interact with any general exclusions related to vehicle rental coverage?
How does the Arrangement of Hotel Accommodation Assistance function in the event of a motor accident, and what costs are covered or excluded under this service?
What is the role of the Emergency Message Transmission Assistance, and are there any timing or documentation requirements for utilizing this service?

Considering that all Motor Emergency Assistance Services are provided on a referral or arrangement basis, how does this affect the insuredâ€™s ability to claim reimbursement for any expenses incurred?
Are there any age or vehicle type restrictions that apply to the availability of the Motor Emergency Assistance Services listed from (a) to (h)?
How does the Service Centre Referral Assistance in Malaysia coordinate with local workshops, and are there any exclusions if the insured is outside Malaysia?
What documentation or proof is required to access the Claims Procedure / Reporting Assistance, and how does this service integrate with the overall claims process under the policy?
If an insured uses the 24 Hours Minor Roadside Repair Assistance but the repair costs exceed a certain amount, how does the policy address the excess costs and potential exclusions?
How do the Motor Emergency Assistance Services interact with any general policy exclusions related to mechanical breakdowns or accidents caused by excluded perils?
In cases where the insured requires both Car Replacement Assistance and Hotel Accommodation Assistance simultaneously, how are the costs and service arrangements managed under the policy?
What are the limitations on the geographic coverage of the Motor Emergency Assistance Services, particularly for the Workshop Referral and Service Centre Referral Assistance in Malaysia?
How does the policy handle situations where the insured incurs expenses for emergency towing or repairs without prior referral or arrangement through the 24 HOUR EMERGENCY HELPLINE?
Are there any waiting periods or activation conditions before the Motor Emergency Assistance Services become available to the insured after a motor accident?
How does the policy address the scenario where the insured requests Emergency Message Transmission Assistance for non-accident-related emergencies?
What is the process for arranging a rental vehicle under the Car Replacement Assistance, and are there any exclusions related to the type or duration of the rental?
How do the Motor Emergency Assistance Services coordinate with other sections of the policy, such as trip cancellation or personal accident coverage, in the event of a motor accident?
Are there any exclusions or limitations on the types of vehicles covered under the 24 Hours Emergency Towing Assistance and Minor Roadside Repair Assistance services?
How does the policy ensure that the insured understands that all costs for the Motor Emergency Assistance Services are to be borne by them, and what are the implications for claims reimbursement?
